General.Name: Daehan Steel
General.Description: Daehan Steel Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells steel products in South Korea and internationally. It offers square billets; deformed bars used as construction material for building concrete structures; processed rebars; and bars in coils for reducing the loss of rebar and enhancing productivity. The company was founded in 1954 and is headquartered in Busan, South Korea.
